api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: An API key used for client-side or server-side authentication. Sent to the Flagsmith API as the `X-Environment-Key` HTTP header to authorize requests.

EnvironmentEvaluationContext.title: Environment Evaluation Context
EnvironmentEvaluationContext.description: Contains information about the environment relevant to feature flag evaluation.

name.title: Feature Name
name.description: The name of the feature being evaluated.

FeatureEvaluationContext.title: Feature Evaluation Context
FeatureEvaluationContext.description: Defines the context for evaluating a specific feature.

identifier.title: User Identifier
identifier.description: The unique identifier for which the evaluation is being performed. If empty, the SDK API uses an anonymous identifier based on a hash of provided traits.

traits.title: User Traits
traits.description: A set of traits associated with the identity for which the evaluation is being performed. The keys represent trait names.

transient.title: Transient Evaluation
transient.description: Indicates whether the evaluation is transient. If true, the identity is treated as temporary and no information is persisted on the server.

IdentityEvaluationContext.title: Identity Evaluation Context
IdentityEvaluationContext.description: Contains identity-related information for feature evaluation.

value.title: Trait Value
value.description: The value associated with the trait.

transient.title: Transient Trait
transient.description: Indicates whether the trait is transient. Transient traits are used for evaluation but are not persisted.

TraitEvaluationContext.title: Trait Evaluation Context
TraitEvaluationContext.description: Defines the context for an individual trait.

name.title: Application Name
name.description: The name of the application. Sent to the Flagsmith API as the `X-Customer-Application-Name` HTTP header.

version.title: Application Version
version.description: The version of the application. Sent to the Flagsmith API as the `X-Customer-Application-Version` HTTP header.

ApplicationEvaluationContext.title: Application Evaluation Context
ApplicationEvaluationContext.description: Contains information about the application that initializes the SDK.

environment.description: Overrides the default environment API key set in the SDK configuration.

identity.description: Defines the identity context, allowing the SDK to evaluate feature flags for a specific identity using identity traits, segments, and overrides.

feature.description: Filters feature evaluation to a specific feature or features. Not supported by all SDKs.

application.description: Overrides the default application name and version set in the SDK configuration. Not supported by all SDKs.

title: Flagsmith Evaluation Context
description: The evaluation context used by the Flagsmith SDK to hold all relevant information for feature flag evaluation.
